<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1821654_kokoro_0.StateTransitionValidator </api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>StateTransitionValidator </name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var StateTransitionValidator = Class.create();
StateTransitionValidator.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {
        // 状态转换矩阵 - 修正版
        // 1=Draft, 10=Submitted, 11=Assigned, 2=In Progress, 4=Completed, 5=Cancelled, 6=On Hold
        // ✅ 关键修改：在 '1' (Draft) 的允许列表中加入了 '11' (Assigned)
        this.allowedTransitions = {
            '1':  ['10', '11', '5'],    // Draft -> Submitted, Assigned, Cancelled
            '10': ['1', '11', '5'],     // Submitted -> Draft, Assigned, Cancelled
            '11': ['10', '2', '5', '6'],// Assigned -> Submitted, In Progress, Cancelled, On Hold
            '2':  ['4', '5', '6'],      // In Progress -> Completed, Cancelled, On Hold
            '4':  [],                   // Completed (终态)
            '5':  [],                   // Cancelled (终态)
            '6':  ['11', '2', '5']      // On Hold -> Assigned, In Progress, Cancelled
        };

        // 角色权限
        this.roleRequirements = {
            '11': ['x_1821654_kokoro_0.volunteer', 'admin'], 
            '2':  ['x_1821654_kokoro_0.volunteer', 'admin'], 
            '4':  ['x_1821654_kokoro_0.volunteer', 'admin'], 
            '5':  ['x_1821654_kokoro_0.requester', 'x_1821654_kokoro_0.volunteer', 'admin'] 
        };
    },

    validateTransition: function(fromState, toState, current) {
        // 转为字符串比较，防止类型不匹配
        fromState = fromState.toString();
        toState = toState.toString();

        if (!this.allowedTransitions.hasOwnProperty(fromState)) {
            // 如果是新记录(空状态)，允许转为 Draft(1)
            if (fromState === '' || fromState === 'undefined') return {valid: true};
            return {valid: false, message: 'Invalid current state: ' + fromState};
        }
        
        var allowed = this.allowedTransitions[fromState];
        // 检查目标状态是否在允许列表中
        if (allowed.indexOf(toState) === -1) {
            return {
                valid: false, 
                message: 'Status transition not allowed: ' + fromState + ' -> ' + toState
            };
        }
        
        // 权限检查
        if (this.roleRequirements.hasOwnProperty(toState)) {
            var requiredRoles = this.roleRequirements[toState];
            var hasRole = false;
            for (var i = 0; i < requiredRoles.length; i++) {
                if (gs.hasRole(requiredRoles[i])) {
                    hasRole = true;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if (!hasRole) {
                return {valid: false, message: 'Insufficient permissions'};
            }
        }
        
        return {valid: true, message: 'Transition allowed'};
    },

    type: 'StateTransitionValidator'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-28 05:47:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>4b21d890837a3210f6b1fb96feaad31a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>StateTransitionValidator </sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kokoro Shelter" source="x_1821654_kokoro_0">80ba4d9583863210f6b1fb96feaad3b2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Kokoro Shelter">80ba4d9583863210f6b1fb96feaad3b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4b21d890837a3210f6b1fb96feaad31a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-28 05:47:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
